response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This extraordinary item holds immense value to both of us, and I believe it would greatly benefit you. Considering its exceptional quality and the impact it can have on your endeavors, I propose a price of $950,000 for this remarkable product. I am confident that this offer represents a fair valuation while allowing us to reach a mutually beneficial agreement. Please let me know if you require any further information or if you wish to discuss this proposal in more detail.", "product_price": 950000}
